Published : May 19 , 2014 3:00 a.m. NEW YORK - Nancy Strumwasser , a high school teacher from Mountain Lakes , New Jersey , always thought she 'd have two children .
But the layoffs that swept over the U.S. economy around the time her son was born six years ago helped change her mind .
Though she and her husband , a market researcher , managed to keep their jobs , she fears they wo n't be so fortunate next time .
